query:
SELECT
                 e.id, e.title, e.slug, e.start, e.guest_list_id,
                 COALESCE(
                     (SELECT COUNT(*)
                      FROM rsvps r
                      JOIN rsvp_sessions rs ON rs.id = r.session_id
                      WHERE rs.event_id = e.id
                        AND rs.status IN ('payment_pending', 'payment_confirmed')),
                     0
                 ) as "rsvp_count!: i64"
               FROM events e
